person.persName: John Thomas Stevenson (Fayette County, Kentucky, farmer and slaveholder.)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, farmer and slaveholder. Kentucky, native. Married to Emily Margeline Cromwell Stevenson in Fayette County, Kentucky in June 1844. Father of Vincent Thomas Stevenson, John W. Stevenson, James B. Stevenson, Tony Stevenson, Mary Stevenson, Richard Higgins Stevenson, and Elizabeth Stevenson Craig. Farmer in Fayette County in 1850. Farmer in Fayette County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1860.
